basics.name: Cole Amparo
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a 2023 Newgrad in Computer Science from the University of Hawaii. I am passionate about Web and Game development, and I have a strong suit in teamwork and communication

work.company: UH Manoa x Hacking 4 Defense x 25th ID
work.summary: Project Manager for a Telebehavorial Health System deployed in training areas in the Phillipines
highlights: Conducted outreach and successfully conducted over 50 customer interviews with military officers to gather valuable insights and feedback.
Played a pivotal role in testing networks and software during deployed training exercises in the Philippines, ensuring seamless operations and enhanced performance.
Developed and implemented the policy framework for 25th ID In-Field Behavioral Telehealth, providing guidelines and procedures for effective delivery of telehealth services.
work.company: Hawaii Department of Labor and Industrial Relations
highlights: Learned how a Governemnt Department organizes and rolls out technology
Deployed 130 new machines for the DCD Division
Learned basic networking and worked in server rooms
Worked with the Workforce Developement Division on Updating and Redoing their online homepage

awards.title: UH Manoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Completed every semester from 2019 with more than 12 credits per, with a 3.5+ GPA
